Synopsis :
Preacher John Worley is battling his inner demons at the grave of his father, when attacked by his undead brother. He sets into motion the apocalypse with a blasphemous curse. The dead begin to rise and destroy humanity. Marty, Richie & Sarah have to fight the undead and learn to survive in a whole new world. Where the dead walk the earth.
